ing: 1 cup shredded whole milk mozzarella, divided
8 ounces homemade or prepared pre-cooked meatballs, diced
n: RITZ White Pizza Meatball Dip, created by Lombardi's Pizza
des: "This creamy, cheesy white pizza meatball dip is Inspired by New York City's famous Lombardi's Pizza. Easy to make, try it with pre-made meatballs or make your own and serve hot with RITZ crackers. This dip will become a staple at all of your get-togethers. Watch the video, then get John Brescio's recipe for RITZ White Pizza Meatball Dip."
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
Combine cream cheese, mayonnaise, grated Parmesan, and oregano.
Reserve 1 tablespoon mozzarella cheese. Stir in remaining mozzarella cheese, meatballs, tomatoes and olives until combined.
Spoon into 1 1/2 quart baking dish.  Top with reserved mozzarella cheese.
Bake uncovered for 25 to 30 minutes.
Serve with RITZ Crackers for dipping.
